nextAction.reason: Critical issues may cause runtime errors or security vulnerabilities

doNot: Do not commit without running typecheck first
Do not push directly to main/master branch
Do not ignore TypeScript errors with @ts-ignore
Do not use `any` type — use proper type definitions
Do not use magic numbers — extract to named constants
Do not write functions longer than 50 lines — extract helper functions
Do not export more than 5 items per file — split into modules
Do not leave console.log in production code

recentCommits.message: feat(status): add AI-friendly output with next-action and do-not sections
fix(refine): check monorepo root for lockfile and README
fix(refine): add UI and Styling to project context output
feat(refine): add enhanced project analysis with AI navigation
